Package net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controller.IUpdate
    Updates handled by the main loop
    IAppHandshakePluginFactory
    This interface creates a contract used by the switch handshake handler.
    INewOFConnectionListener
    a listener that is notified when a new OFConnection has been opened and handshaked (i.e., the OFFeaturesReply has been received.
    IOFConnectionListener  
    IOFSwitchManager  
    IOFSwitchService  
    ISwitchDriverRegistry
    Maintain a registry for SwitchDrivers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CmdLineSettings
    Expresses the port settings of OpenFlow controller.
    Controller
    The main controller class.
    ControllerCounters  
    ControllerTest  
    FloodlightProvider  
    HandshakeTimeoutHandler
    Trigger a timeout if a switch fails to complete handshake soon enough
    MockOFConnection  
    MockOFSwitchImpl
    A sublcass of OFSwitchImpl that contains extra setters.
    NiciraRoleUtils
    static utilities to convert between Pre-OF1.2 "Nicira Style" roles and OF1.2+ OpenFlow standard roles.
    NullConnection  
    OFChannelHandlerVer10Test  
    OFChannelHandlerVer13Test  
    OFChannelInfo
    Basic information that OFChannelHandler attaches to the netty channel via Channel#setAttachment(Object), mainly for the purpose of being able to log the connection information.
    OFChannelInitializer
    Creates a ChannelPipeline for a server-side openflow channel
    OFChannelInitializer.PipelineHandler  
    OFChannelInitializer.PipelineHandshakeTimeout
    Timeouts for parts of the handshake, in seconds
    OFChannelInitializer.PipelineIdleReadTimeout
    Timeouts for reads on connections, in seconds
    OFChannelInitializer.PipelineIdleWriteTimeout
    Timeouts for writes on connections, in seconds
    OFConnection
    Implementation of an openflow connection to switch.
    OFConnectionCounters
    Implementation of Counters for per-connection statistics for OpenFlow messages.
    OFConnectionTest  
    OFMessageDecoder
    Decode an openflow message from a channel, for use in a netty pipeline.
    OFMessageEncoder
    Encode an iterable of openflow messages for output into a ByteBuf, for use in a netty pipeline
    OFSwitch
    This is the internal representation of an openflow switch.
    OFSwitch.PortManager
    Manages the ports of this switch.
    OFSwitch.SwitchRoleMessageValidator  
    OFSwitchAppHandshakePlugin
    This class is a plugin that can be used by applications to tap into the switch handshake.
    OFSwitchBaseTest  
    OFSwitchHandlerTestBase  
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandler
    Switch handler deals with the switch connection and dispatches switch messages to the appropriate locations.
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandlerVer10Test  
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandlerVer13Test  
    OFSwitchManager
    The Switch Manager class contains most of the code involved with dealing with switches.
    OFSwitchManagerTest  
    OFSwitchTest  
    PluginResult
    Class that represents the result of an app handshake plugin.
    RoleManager
    A utility class to manage the controller roles.
    RoleManagerCounters  
    RoleManagerTest  
    ShutdownServiceImpl  
    SwitchEvent  
    SwitchManagerCounters  
    TableFeatures
    A small, immutable container for organizing the features of a particular table on a switch.

    Enum Description
    Controller.ModuleLoaderState  
    OFSwitchAppHandshakePlugin.PluginResultType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HandshakeTimeoutException
    Exception is thrown when the handshake fails to complete before a specified time
    OFAuxException
    This exception indicates an error or unexpected message during OF Aux handshaking.
    OFErrorMsgException
    raised/reported by Futures in @IOFConnection when a an OFErrorMsg is received in response to a OFRequest sent via OFConnection#writeRequest(OFRequest) or OFConnection#writeStatsRequest(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFStatsRequest).
    SwitchStateException
    This exception indicates an error or unexpected message during message handling.
